page.title: 07 Church Street
page.content: At the end of the bottom half of Church Street is Shirley Baptist Church and Church Hall.They were using the Church Hall for a playgroup when we passed. Next to the Church Hall is the Kings Arms and next to that is the Telephone Exchange. On the other side of Church Street is a car repair and Audio shop and the Crust Cottage which sells cakes and bread. Next is Quality Fabrics, Cardwell the Photographers, Fret Music shop, Sunbeam cafe, a TV services shop, a lane leading to Vincents Grove, Soper Bucher Dorella hair stylist, Moby Dick fish and chips shop, a large shop which has closed down lately but used to sell kitchen units, and last of all on the corner of Church Street with Shirley High Street is a motorists' centre.
